#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

    int reverse(int a)
    {
     int rev=0;
    	while(a!=0)
    	{
      int b=a%10;
      rev=rev*10+b;
      a=a/10;
         	}
       return rev;
       }
int main()
{
	int a;
	cin>>a;
	for(int i=0;i<a;i++)
	{
		int fnum,snum;
		cin>>fnum>>snum;
		cout<<reverse(reverse(fnum)+reverse(snum))<<"\n";
		
	}

	return 0;
}
